yh satanic demon noe em or slim people miss whats blatantly obvious,does it matter what the image is really as u miss the point eminem or marshall are just like most other artist they promote satanism etc as thats what you have to do to make it or retain fame u promote what the totally CONTROLLED music industry tells you to or u fade away,illuminati i doubt it music artist wish they were part of the elites thats why they promote illuminati theyre told what to do wear,sing,say or no FAME.whilst millions of people regard celebrities as GODS  whilst being robbed of most human rights n true freedom by the true elite families and businesses.like i said does the true meaning of the image matter no it dont it just keeps people busy busy busy.open your minds to issues that matter not some daft picture.1 last thing the REAL EMINEM WAS awesome dnt know who this impersonater is but it aint EMINEM,nor does it sound like him look like him or even flow remotely like him n b4 u say people change flows n sound yh they do but not from a killer flow I.E infinite,MMLP1,SLIM SHADY LP,EMINEM SHOW.too some whack constantly shouting shit flow.do some research guys i want the real EMINEM bk.

im saying most music artist wish they were but really none of them are they maybe used as puppets but the real elites care as much about music artist as they do the average guy or girl on the street they dont. music artist promote what there told to promote or no more FAME

haha did you even read the comment errr no.who said illuminati most music artist wish they were but really they aint.and i aint going there mate you obviously dont have the brain capacity to have an intelligent conversation.bk to sleep u go mate.SHEEPLE DO MY HEAD IN,and venom is a character from spiderman.theres a difference between comic book characters and real life you do know this dont you haha i wont get into subliminal or subconscious messages in art or imagery or music, u stick to watching SPIDERMAN u wont hurt your brain then ZOMBIE
